description: Front Elevation: Replacement of 2no. garage style doors with windows in similar size and style. Lowering cill level to windows on 1st floor and replacing 3no. painted casement windows while adding fixed timber panels to low level. Materiality to match existing in order to retain similarities in aesthetics of the front facade. Lowering cill level to windows on 2nd floor and replacing painted casement windows with double-glazed doors, with modest, painted metal railing to Juliet balconies. Materiality to match existing in order to retain similarities in aesthetics of the front facade. Existing external render finish to ground floor to be extended up to the roof light. New modest entrance portico. Rear Elevation: Lowering cill level to 2no. casement windows on 1st floor and replacing with painted timber French doors. Lowering cill level to 3no. casement windows on 2nd floor and replacing with painted timber French doors, with modest metal railings to Juliet balconies.  (Certificate of Lawful Proposed Use/Development)
